author: Lyzza
title: Constance Leathart: The forgotten 'aviatrix' of WW2
text: Posts: 646 Constance Leathart: The forgotten 'aviatrix' of WW2 The great contribution of women to the war effort in WWII is usually overlooked or just plain ignored. Here is one of those brave women. We should also not forget the women pilots that flew in the US during the war. Not all women were nurses, secretaries, or worked in factories, though they also did an important job too.
